name: Extreme Moto Driving
description:
Did you ever want a motorcycle in real life?
Extreme Moto Rider is the new standard in the genre of street and village races. Evaluate the amazing graphics and drive a tense race! Having traveled street traffic, road racing and testing. Click on the gas and start the race for the title of the fastest biker in the world! Arrange a risky ride in four unique regions, Desert, Suburbs, Snow and Night City.

Features:

- Free Mode
-
- Arrange risky driving on the Dirt extreme roads of four unique regions: Desert, Suburbs, Snow and Night City
- Increase speed, improve brakes and earn extra lives!
- Choose your favorite category of motorcycles, cross-country motorcycles, choppers, or superbikes!
